Action.author: rickr
Action.body: TLS is provided by GRPC that the SDK uses. The integrtion test are run with TLS enabled and have always been passing. No one else is reporting this in the community that I know have been using TLS. Please look and follow the integration test examples in getting TLS to work.

Action.author: anilbs
Action.body: My TLS issues is on VPC with orderer and peers on different Virtual Machines ....

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: I would try looking at the end2end integration tests and see first of all can you get a connection using that code to the orderer _out side of the webapp_ environment. Then go from there.

Action.author: tkuhrt
Action.body: ~rickr : Can you provide a pointer to these end2end tests?
